languages.text: "Я надеялся, что вы так ответите. Блюстители, к бою! За правосудие Чорда и Императора!"

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Я рассчитывал на такой ответ. Огонь!

languages.text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: "Я надеялся, что вы так ответите. Блюстители, к бою! За правосудие Чорда и Императора!"

traits.locale_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"
"I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"
"I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"
"I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

languages.text: “我正等着你们这么回答呢。执法者，开始攻击！为了库尔达的正义！为了帝皇！”
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “我正等着你们这么回答呢。执法者，开始攻击！为了库尔达的正义！为了帝皇！”

languages.text: «Eso es lo que esperaba oír. ¡Seguridad, al ataque! ¡Por la justicia de Chorda y el Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso es lo que esperaba oír. ¡Seguridad, al ataque! ¡Por la justicia de Chorda y el Emperador!».

languages.text: 「こうなるだろうと思っていた。執行者よ、攻撃せよ！チョーダの正義と、皇帝のために！」
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「こうなるだろうと思っていた。執行者よ、攻撃せよ！チョーダの正義と、皇帝のために！」

languages.text: « C'est la réponse que j'espérais entendre. Prévôts, à l'attaque ! Pour la justice de Chorda et de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est la réponse que j'espérais entendre. Prévôts, à l'attaque ! Pour la justice de Chorda et de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Ich hatte gehofft, dass Ihr so reagiert. Enforcers, Angriff! Für die Gerechtigkeit des Hauses Chorda und des Imperators!"
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte gehofft, dass Ihr so reagiert. Enforcers, Angriff! Für die Gerechtigkeit des Hauses Chorda und des Imperators!"

languages.text: "Tam da beklediğim cevap. İnfazcılar, saldırın! Chorda ve İmparator'un adaleti için!"
languages.original_text: "I hoped you would respond like this. Enforcers, attack! For the justice of Chorda and the Emperor!"
